name: Ride Concepts Hellion Cycling Shoes - Unisex
description: A freeride MTB shoe with big-mountain protection and urban style. The two-panel synthetic upper is Ride Concept's most durable and protective, with an anti-peel coating and perforations for enhanced breathability. RC worked with the experts at Rubber Kinetics to create a proprietary outsole compound that provides excellent pedal control without sacrificing durability.Two-panel synthetic upper is durable and protective.Perforated for enhanced breathability.Fully gusseted tongue keeps debris out.Moulded toe and heel guard protect your feet from big hits.D30 insole adds additional protection in high impact zones underfoot.EVA midsole provides support and shock absorption.Outsole compound strikes a balance between grip and durability.Hexagonal tread pattern enhances grip on flat pedals.
